payload.title: Implement RelationshipAnalyzer for graph analysis and hierarchy building
payload.description:
Implement the RelationshipAnalyzer class responsible for analyzing entity relationships and building hierarchical structures. Includes:

- Epic task detection using tag analysis (epic:* pattern)
- Hierarchy building with circular dependency prevention
- Graph analysis and validation
- Node and edge construction for DiagramGraph
- Assignment detection from FeedbackRecords
- Relationship mapping between Cycles and Tasks

This class provides the intelligence for understanding entity relationships and building the graph structure.
payload.notes: Core intelligence component. Must implement circular dependency detection. Required by DiagramGenerator.
